frames.caption: An elderly man with glasses is seated at a desk, typing on a laptop in a classroom setting. In the background, other individuals are also engaged with their laptops, while a woman appears to be assisting one of them.
frames.description: The scene takes place in a classroom or workshop environment, where several people are using laptops, possibly participating in a learning session or workshop. The focus is on an elderly man who seems to be concentrating on his work.

frames.caption: A group of people are seated in a classroom or lecture hall, facing a presenter at the front. The presenter is standing near a screen displaying a presentation slide, while attendees are attentively listening.
frames.description: The scene is set in a lecture hall or classroom where a presentation is taking place. The audience is composed of several individuals seated in rows, focusing on the speaker and the projected slide.

summary: People: elderly man, woman, group of individuals, audience, presenter. Objects: laptop, desk, glasses, chairs, projector screen. Actions: typing, assisting, listening, presenting. Emotions: concentration, attentive. Scenes: classroom, workshop, lecture, presentation. Concepts: learning, technology use
